title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in New York 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have declined. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in USD have increased.
Out of all 2 groups, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q4 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q4.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q1.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have been declined whereas increased for Quarter.

In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q1.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have declined. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in USD have increased.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 389.0 among the 2 groups and in Q4, 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD 0.0.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q1.
The maximum Average daily rate in USD for 2016 that was found in Quarter Q4 was 1.5 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in USD observed in Quarter Q1.
Among the groups, 2016 had the biggest difference in Average daily rate in USD. Where the maximum Average daily rate in USD was 1.5 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in USD.
Averaging all 2 groups 2016, and 2017, the Quarter Q1 is the maximum Average daily rate in USD and Q3 is the minimum Average daily rate in USD.
